entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 11 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of thundershowers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 18 except 11 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 12:38 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
